# Getting Started

Welcome to the platform! This guide walks you through initial setup.

## Prerequisites

- A verified email address
- An active billing plan

## Create Your First Workspace

Follow the onboarding workflow to create and configure your workspace.

## Next Steps

Explore the API reference to learn about available endpoints.
